scripts.preinstall: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.start: pm2 start pm2.config.js --env development && pm2 monit
scripts.prod: pm2 start pm2.config.js --env production && pm2 monit
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-client && npm run clean-server
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.build-all: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.install-server: npm run install-gateway && npm run install-cache && npm run install-user && npm run install-order && npm run install-old-server && npm run install-shared && npm run install-broker && npm run install-comment && npm run install-notify && npm run install-event
scripts.build-server: npm run build-gateway && npm run build-cache && npm run build-user && npm run build-order && npm run build-old-server && npm run build-shared && npm run build-broker && npm run build-comment && npm run build-notify && npm run build-event
scripts.klabam: npm i && npm run build && npm run prod
